text: Assosuṃ kho kesamuttiyā kālāmā samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito kesamuttaṃ anuppatto
edit: Assosuṃ kho kesamuttiyā kālāmā – samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito kesamuttaṃ anuppatto

translations.transtext: The Kālāmas in Kesamutta have heard that "Ascetic Gotama, a son of the Sākya, having gone forth from the Sākya clan, has reached Kesamutta."
